org.knime.base.node.preproc.datavalidator

Class DataValidatorCellDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.knime.base.node.preproc.datavalidator.DataValidatorCellDecorator

  • abstract class DataValidatorCellDecorator
extends Object
    Uses the decorator pattern for data cell validation. I.e. missing value or domain checks can be dynamically added and the functionality is nice encapsulated. See the factory methods on this class to receive instances.
    Author:
    Marcel Hanser

      Tries to convert the given cell to the given type.
      (package private) abstract DataCell doHandleCell(RowKey rowKey, DataCell decoratedCell)
      Performs the actual validation, which may add conflicts or return a converted cell.

    • Method Detail

      • handleCell

        final DataCell handleCell(RowKey rowKey,
                          DataCell cell)
        First invokes the handleCell(RowKey, DataCell) method on the inner decorator and afterwards performs doHandleCell(RowKey, DataCell) on the result.
        Parameters:
        rowKey - the row this cell is contained in
        cell - the data cell
        Returns:
        the (decorated) cell

      • doHandleCell

        abstract DataCell doHandleCell(RowKey rowKey,
                               DataCell decoratedCell)
        Performs the actual validation, which may add conflicts or return a converted cell.
        Parameters:
        rowKey - the row key this cell is contained in
        decoratedCell - the cell which might be changed in inner decorators
        Returns:
        the decorated data cell

      • getDataColumnSpec

        protected DataColumnSpec getDataColumnSpec()
        Returns:
        the data column spec associated with this decorator

      • getInputColumnName

        protected String getInputColumnName()
        Returns:
        the name of the input column spec

      • forColumn

        static DataValidatorCellDecorator forColumn(String inputColumnName,
                                            DataColumnSpec inputSpec)
        The basic decorator which returns the name and the input spec.
        Parameters:
        inputColumnName - the input column name
        inputSpec - the input column spec
        Returns:
        the decorator

      • missingHandlingCellDecorator

        static DataValidatorCellDecorator missingHandlingCellDecorator(DataValidatorCellDecorator inner,
                                                               DataValidatorColConflicts conflicts)
        Adds a conflict if a missing value is contained.
        Parameters:
        inner - the inner decorator
        conflicts - the conflicts collection
        Returns:
        a decorator

      • convertionCellDecorator

        static DataValidatorCellDecorator convertionCellDecorator(DataValidatorCellDecorator inner,
                                                          DataValidatorColConfiguration.DataTypeHandling handling,
                                                          DataValidatorColConfiguration.ConvertionType type,
                                                          DataColumnSpec referenceSpec,
                                                          DataValidatorColConflicts conflicts)
        Tries to convert the given cell to the given type. Missing values are directly returned
        Parameters:
        inner - the inner decorator
        handling - data type handling
        type - to convert into
        referenceSpec - the reference specification
        conflicts - the conflicts collection
        Returns:
        a decorator

      • domainHandlingCellDecorator

        static DataValidatorCellDecorator domainHandlingCellDecorator(DataValidatorCellDecorator inner,

                                                              DataCell max,
                                                              DataColumnSpec referenceSpec,
                                                              DataValidatorColConflicts conflicts)
        Checks that the given cell is within the given domain.
        Parameters:
        inner - the inner decorator
        comparator - data value comparator for this spec
        domainHandling - the domain handling
        min - minimum value
        max - maximum value
        referenceSpec - the reference spec
        conflicts - the conflicts collection
        Returns:
        a decorator

        domainHandling - the domain handling
        values - possible values
        referenceSpec - the reference spec
        conflicts - the conflicts collection
        Returns:
